content: अक्षम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. त.] {@--1@} Unfit, incompetent, unable; कार्य, °पलायन°, उपवास° &c. {@--2@} Unable to bear or endure, not forbearing, non-forbearing; impatient; °मा कालहरणस्य <ls>Ś. 3</ls> unable to brook delay, admitting of no delay; मामक्षमं मंडनकालहानेः <ls>R. 13. 16.</ls> --मा [न. त] {@--1@} Impatience, intolerance; envy, jealousy; धावंत्यमी मृगजवाक्षमयेव रथ्याः <ls>Ś. 1. 8</ls> as if envying (jealous of) the deer's speed. {@--2@} Anger, passion.
